definitions.definition: A journey undertaken to accomplish some task.

subdefinitions.definition: A mundane mission of no great consequence, concerning household or business affairs (dropping items by, doing paperwork, going to a friend's house, etc.)
examples: The errands before he could start the project included getting material at the store and getting the tools he had lent his neighbors.
I'm going to town on some errands .

definitions.definition: The purpose of such a journey.
An oral message trusted to a person for delivery.

main_definition: A journey undertaken to accomplish some task.
secondary_definitions: The purpose of such a journey.
An oral message trusted to a person for delivery.
